appDesc.message: 2 pane type bookmark manager, and utilities for Restore Session, Recent History, Google bookmarks, Extensions and so on.

deleteConfirm.message:
The target folder "$folderName$" is not empty!
Are you sure you want to Delete?

options.message: "general":       "General",       "openNewTab":    "Opens bookmark in new tab",       "openRight":     "at right of current tab",       "openRightEnd":  "at right end of tabs",       "memoryFolder":  "Restores previous arrangement",       "openExclusive": "Opens folder in exclusive",       "noDispRoot":    "Hides root folder",       "noDispOther":   "Hides \"Other bookmarks\" folder",       "standalone":    "Window mode",       "mouse":         "Mouse/keyboard",       "noWheelLoop":   "Do not loop folder items with wheel navigation",       "noWheelLoopBM": "Do not loop bookmark items with wheel navigation",       "wheelSense":    "Wheel sensitivity",       "wheelSenseNrm": "Normal",       "wheelSenseSlow":"Operates in two steps",       "exterior":      "Exterior",       "swapPane":      "Swap the position of bookmarks pane and folders pane",       "zoom":          "Zoom",       "markerColor":   "Marker, Frame and Icon color",       "markerColorBkg": "Marker background color",       "markerColorFont":"Marker font color",       "setFolderIcon":  "Set folder color/icon...",       "addonFolder":    "Add-on folder",       "dispMostVisited":"Most visited",       "dispRecentVisited":"Recent history -
